content: शुक्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शुच्-रक नि° कुत्वम्] <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Bright, radiant, shining. {@--2@} White, pure. --क्रः {@--1@} The planet Venus. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the preceptor of the Asuras, who, by means of his magical charm, restored to life the demons killed in battle; see कच, देवयानी, and ययाति. {@--3@} The month of Jyeṣṭha. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Agni or fire. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the plant Citraka. --क्रं {@--1@} Semen virile; पुमान् पुंसोऽधिक शुक्रे स्त्री भवत्यधिके स्त्रियाः <ls>Ms. 3. 49</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 63.</ls> {@--2@} The essence of anything. {@--3@} Male and female energy. {@--4@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Water.
